name: Itty BItty Fishy
description:
Welcome to Itty Bitty Fishy, a small game about feeding and looking after your very own little pet fish. You earn money by catching and then selling other fish. You can use this money for a variety of things like buying food for your fish and upgrading your boat and fishing rod.

How To Play:

Controls

  • A and D or Left and Right keys to move the boat.
  • Hold the space key to throw out the hook.
  • WASD or arrow keys to move the hook while in the water.
  • While at the docks, click on a fish to sell it.
  • While not at the docks, click on a fish to feed it to your fish.

Objective

  • When hooking a fish you need to bring them back up to the bobber in order to catch them.
  • To sell fish you will want to go to the left until you reach the docks, where you can sell your fish and buy upgrades.
  • Upgrading your rod helps you fight against fish you hook.
  • Upgrading your boat lets you store more fish.
  • Have fun :)
